testCase.name: latest by offset
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ROWKEY BIGINT KEY, ID BIGINT, F0 INTEGER, F1 BIGINT, F2 DOUBLE, F3 BOOLEAN, F4 STRING) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='test_topic', KEY='ID', VALUE_FORMAT='JSON');

CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT
  INPUT.ID ID,
  LATEST_BY_OFFSET(INPUT.F0) L0,
  LATEST_BY_OFFSET(INPUT.F1) L1,
  LATEST_BY_OFFSET(INPUT.F2) L2,
  LATEST_BY_OFFSET(INPUT.F3) L3,
  LATEST_BY_OFFSET(INPUT.F4) L4
FROM INPUT INPUT
GROUP BY INPUT.ID
EMIT CHANGES;
